structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth

law.catch_line: Department As Public Agency For Purposes Of State Contracts
law.text: The department shall be deemed to be a public agency for purposes of, and shall be subject to, section 39M of chapter 30 and sections 44A to 44H, inclusive, of chapter 149 and shall comply with requirements applicable to an independent public authority for publication of contract information in the central register established pursuant to section 20A of chapter 9.
